mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAL (writer, title, started_at, ended_at, original_price, sale_price, address, content, location_code) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{startedAt}, #{endedAt}, #{originalPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{address}, #{content}, #{locationCode})

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (type_code, target_no, original_name, saved_name) VALUES
(#{img.typeCode}, #{img.targetNo}, #{img.originalName}, #{img.savedName})
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, a.* FROM SAL s LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT a ON s.sale_no = a.target_no AND a.type_code = 'SAL' ORDER BY s.sale_no DESC
